name: cwTactics
description: Custom Wars: Tactics **(CW:T)** is a rebuild of the original game series Advance Wars. The project itself contains 3 different pieces of software. The game engine, that holds the complete game with its logic, scripts and data. The desktop client which is a graphical front end for the game engine written in Java and the mobile client, a graphical frontend for CW:T completely written with web technologies.
